name.ja: <ruby>鼓<rt>こ</rt></ruby><ruby>動<rt>どう</rt></ruby>する<ruby>進<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>化<rt>か</rt></ruby>の<ruby>繭<rt>まゆ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Send the top card of your Deck to the Graveyard.

effect.en: This turn, this card's name becomes "Cocoon of Evolution". Then, you can Fusion Summon "Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth" by shuffling monsters from your field and/or Graveyard into the owner's Deck as material, including this card.
